comments: 'E.C.Parish' is an error for 'C.S.P.Parish' used by Rchb.f. in Trans. Linn. Soc. 30 (1): 133-155 (1874) and Otia Bot. Hamburg. 1: 45-47  (1878). See obit. of C.S.P.Parish in Orchid Rev. 5: 322-323 (1897)
examples: Bulbophyllum foenisecii C.S.P.Parish ex Rchb.f. in Bot. Zeitung (Berlin) 23: 99. (1865). Sarcanthus densiflorus C.S.P.Parish & Rchb.f. Trans. Linn. Soc. London 30(1): 136. 1874
source: Liberty Hyde Hortorium, Hortus Third, (1976). Orchid Rev. 5: 322-323 (1897).
